title: Security
content: All assets bridged to the PFN are secured and can't be lost.

title: Regulatory Friendly
content: All dApps built on the PFN are regulatory friendly as every user must complete KYC/AML before access is granted.

title: Custodial Optional
content: Users can access certain dApps outside of the PFN from within using custodial services (eg CEX trades).
